item.title: Iowa-UConn women's Final Four game is the most-watched hoops game in ESPN history
item.description: Friday's semifinal averaged 14.2 million viewers, making it the most-viewed women's basketball game on record and the largest audience for an ESPN basketball broadcast.
item.content:encoded:
Friday's semifinal averaged 14.2 million viewers, making it the most-viewed women's basketball game on record and the largest audience for an ESPN basketball broadcast.

(Image credit: Morry Gash)

item.title: Authorities investigate suspected arson at Sen. Bernie Sanders' Vermont office
item.description: Burlington police say a male suspect set a door on fire Friday morning, trapping people inside and damaging the building. No injuries were reported, and Sanders wasn't in the state at the time.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Some Walmart shoppers could get up to $500 in cash from a class-action settlement
item.description: Customers who bought certain grocery products at Walmart stores nationwide between October 2018 and January 2024 have until early June to file for payments, whether or not they kept their receipts.

item.title: Israel says it has recovered the body of Israeli hostage Elad Katzir in Gaza
item.description: Elad Katzir, 47, was from Nir Oz, a kibbutz near the Gaza border. The small community of 400 residents was among the hardest hit in Israel by Hamas-led attackers on Oct. 7.
